E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 8/14/1991
Subject: Progress of Homer Bush
Dear Sir,
Homer Bush has nothing more to prove at A Clearwater Phillies!
He has an AVG of .286 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 8/20/1991
Subject: Successful Promotion Day
Hello,
That was quite a nice game, the fans loved it!
It seems that the promotion was a success, our
fan interest increased!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Thursday, 8/28/1991
Subject: Chris Haney healing process
Chris Haney is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Tuesday, 9/2/1991
Subject: Progress of Barry Manuel
Dear Sir,
Barry Manuel is doing pretty good at AA Reading Phillies!
He has an ERA of 3.97, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
